sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>false</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_employee_profile</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_employee_profile">employment_start_dateVALCHANGES^ORemployment_end_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="employment_start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="employment_end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Synchronize fields to HR profile</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var hr_profile = new sn_hr_core.hr_Profile(current.user.sys_id, gs).getCurrentProfile(current.user.sys_id); if (!gs.nil(hr_profile)) { hr_profile.employment_start_date = current.employment_start_date; hr_profile.employment_end_date = current.employment_end_date; hr_profile.update(); } }(current, previous)); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-24 19:42:51</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0074f9637303001001b566b90ff6a794</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Synchronize fields to HR profile</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Employee Profile" source="sn_employee">1e95bac2738f001001b566b90ff6a7cd</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Profile">1e95bac2738f001001b566b90ff6a7cd</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0074f9637303001001b566b90ff6a794</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-10-05 10:40:29</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0074f9637303001001b566b90ff6a794"/> </record_update>
